00026 template<class function>
00027         void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomFunction(
00028                  C4DView *view) {
00029             function *tmp = new function (
00030                 view->Values()->tmin (), view->Values()->tmax (), view->Values()->dt (),
00031                 view->Values()->umin (), view->Values()->umax (), view->Values()->du (),
00032                 view->Values()->vmin (), view->Values()->vmax (), view->Values()->dv ());
00033             if (tmp->isValid()) {
00034                     view->setF(tmp);
00035                     QString sym (((function *)(view->F()).get ())->symbolic());
00036 
00037                 view->AssignValues(view->F());
00038                 view->Redraw ();
00039             } else {
00040                 delete tmp;
00041                 view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00042             }
00043         }
